item.title: CVE-2024-3072|2024-04-30T08:32:23.028Z -- horiondigital -- ACF Front End Editor
item.description: The ACF Front End Editor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the update_texts() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.0.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to update arbitrary post title, content, and ACF data.
